product_name: JVC Adixxion Handle Bar Camera Mount
long_description: The JVC Adixxion handle bar camera mount lets you fasten the JVC Adixxion camera (sold separately) securely and easily onto a bicycle handlebar. Mount also fits any pipe, rod, or other bar with a diameter between 2mm and 30mm.
short_description: The JVC Adixxion handle bar camera mount lets you fasten the JVC Adixxion camera (sold separately) securely and easily onto a bicycle handlebar.
